product_title: Iren Slim Fit Denim Jacket with Leather Collar
product_details_and_care:
A genuine leather collar and distressed details amplify the vintage rock 'n' roll style of this slim-cut denim jacket.
24 1/2" length (size Medium)
Front button closure
Spread collar
Long sleeves with single-button cuffs
Chest button-flap patch pockets; vertical welt pockets
Adjustable button-tab hem
Unlined
99% cotton, 1% spandex with genuine leather collar
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Item #5767683
product_size_info:
True to size.
Considered a Slim fit; fitted through the chest, armholes and sides.
